soothe.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make someone feel calmer and less anxious, upset, or angry
soothe.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Lucy soothed the baby by rocking it in her arms.
She made a cup of tea to soothe her nerves.
soothe.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to make a pain become less severe, or slowly disappear
soothe.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I bought some lozenges to soothe my sore throat.
Massage can gently soothe away your aches and pains.
